meanings.sent1: The extortionary demands made by the bully were unfair.
meanings.sent2: The extortionary behavior of the corrupt official was finally exposed.
meanings.sent3: The extortionary squirrel demanded extra nuts for safe passage through the tree.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in an extortionary manner, threatening a downpour.
meanings.sent5: The extortionary tactics of the villain made him a feared figure in the town.

meanings.definition: Inclined to extort money or favors from others.
meanings.sent1: The extortionary friend always asked for expensive gifts.
meanings.sent2: She had an extortionary nature, always looking for ways to benefit herself.
meanings.sent3: The extortionary cat meowed until it received extra treats from its owner.
meanings.sent4: The tree's branches reached out in an extortionary manner, seeking sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The extortionary businessman manipulated his employees for personal gain.

meanings.sent1: The extortionary laws were put in place to prevent corruption.
meanings.sent2: He specialized in extortionary cases, bringing justice to victims.
meanings.sent3: The extortionary parrot demanded crackers as payment for its tricks.
meanings.sent4: The extortionary shadows crept along the walls, hiding secrets.
meanings.sent5: The extortionary scheme was uncovered by the vigilant detective.
